text:
I got into @_buildspace's n&w s5!

They have really cool stuff like an AI (sage) and much more.

Can't wait to build cool shit and talk to awesome people.

P.S: I get to invite 5 outsiders as "buddies" to join in. If you're crazy about building stuff, say "BUDDY" in the comments https://t.co/mP4ceRIvEO
